data.title: Shah Rukh Khan Actor,Shah Rukh Khan Profile,Shah Rukh Khan Movies,Shah Rukh Khan Wallpapers,Shah Rukh Khan Photo Gallery
data.text:
Biography:

Shah Rukh Khan was born into a middle-class family in Delhi and pursued a degree in Economics at Hansraj College, Delhi University. His early forays into acting included appearances in television serials like "Fauji" and "Circus." He made his film debut in the 1992 film "Deewana" and soon gained widespread recognition with films like "Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge" and "Dil To Pagal Hai."

His charming personality, exceptional acting skills, and dedication to his craft have made him one of the most beloved and successful actors in the world. Beyond acting, he has ventured into film production through his company Red Chillies Entertainment and also hosted the popular television show "Kaun Banega Crorepati."

Shah Rukh Khan is known for his philanthropic work and is involved in various charitable endeavors. He has a massive global fan following and is often recognized as one of the most influential and richest actors in the world.

More

Shah Rukh Khan is a co-owner of the Kolkata Knight Riders, a team in the Indian Premier League (IPL).

He has received honorary doctorates from several universities, including the University of Bedfordshire in the United Kingdom.

Khan has appeared in several international projects and has been recognized globally for his contributions to cinema.
